# sci

Scientific calculator

| Operation  | Description
|------------|---------------
| [`abs`](#abs) | Absolute value
| [`acos`](#acos) | Inverse cosine
| [`acosh`](#acosh) | Inverse hyperbolic cosine
| [`asin`](#asin) | Inverse sine
| [`asinh`](#asinh) | Inverse hyperbolic sine
| [`atan`](#atan) | Inverse tangent
| [`atan2`](#atan2) | Inverse tangent
| [`atanh`](#atanh) | Inverse hyperbolic tangent
| [`ceil`](#ceil) | Ceiling
| [`cos`](#cos) | Cosine
| [`cosh`](#cosh) | Hyperbolic cosine
| [`e`](#e)  | Euler's number
| [`exp`](#exp) | Natural exponential
| [`floor`](#floor) | Floor
| [`log`](#log) | Natural logarithm
| [`log10`](#log10) | Decimal logarithm
| [`log2`](#log2) | Binary logarithm
| [`pi, π`](#pi) | Circumference to diameter ratio
| [`sin`](#sin) | Sine
| [`sinh`](#sinh) | Hyperbolic sine
| [`tan`](#tan) | Tangent
| [`tanh`](#tanh) | Hyperbolic tangent


## abs

If *p0* is less than zero, the negated value of *p0*, otherwise *p0*.

```
( p0:BigInt -- BigInt )
( p0:Decimal -- Decimal )
( p0:Float -- Float )
( p0:Rational -- Rational )
```

Example:

<!-- test: abs -->

| Input | Stack
|-------|---------------
| `-6 ` | `-6`
| `abs` | `6`

## acos

Inverse cosine of *p0* in radians.

```
( p0:Float -- Float )
```

Example:

<!-- test: acos -->

| Input              | Stack
|--------------------|---------------
| `0.5 acos 5 round` | `1.0472`

( p0:Float -- Float )

| `2 acosh 5 round` | `1.31696`

```
( p0:Float p1:Float -- Float )
```

| Input               | Stack
|---------------------|---------------

## ceil

The nearest integer value greater than or equal to *p0*.

```
( p0:BigInt -- BigInt )
( p0:Decimal -- Decimal )
( p0:Float -- Float )
```

Example:

<!-- test: ceil -->

| Input  | Stack
|--------|---------------
| `6.12` | `6.12`
| `ceil` | `7`

## floor

The nearest integer value less than or equal to *p0*.

```
( p0:BigInt -- BigInt )
( p0:Decimal -- Decimal )
( p0:Float -- Float )
```

Example:

<!-- test: floor -->

| Input   | Stack
|---------|---------------
| `6.12 ` | `6.12`
| `floor` | `6`

Alias: `π`

```
(  -- Decimal )
```
